item.title: 监视：橡树的霍华德-马克斯认为公司仍在 "裸泳
item.description:
橡树庄园的传奇人物 说，压力就在眼前，因为  "潮水还没有退去"

Distress is on the horizon, the Oaktree legend says, because ‘the tide hasn’t gone out’

item.title: 纽约银行新老板希望它看起来更像其他地区性银行
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的新领导人希望这家陷入困境的商业地产贷款公司看起来更像其他地区性银行。【原文：New York Community Bancorp’s new leader wants the beleaguered commercial real estate lender to look more like other regional banks.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行正密切关注商业地产
item.description: 2023 年 3 月 16 日星期四，在德国法兰克福举行的利率决议新闻发布会上，欧洲中央银行（ECB）副总裁路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）。欧洲央行继续按计划将利率上调半个百分点，但对随后可能采取的行动保持沉默，因为市场动荡令瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）感到不安。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Luis de Guindos, vice president of the European Central Bank (ECB), at a rates decision news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, on Thursday, March 16, 2023. The European Central Bank went ahead with a planned half-point increase in interest rates but was silent on what may follow amid market turmoil that roiled Credit Suisse Group AG. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 据说阿布扎比将利用花旗、汇丰和 FAB 为阿提哈德航空首次公开募股牵线搭桥
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，ADQ 已为枢纽航空公司阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways PJSC）可能进行的首次公开募股挑选了包括花旗集团、汇丰控股有限公司和阿布扎比第一银行在内的顾问。【原文：ADQ has picked advisers including Citigroup Inc., HSBC Holdings Plc and First Abu Dhabi Bank for a potential initial public offering of hub carrier Etihad Airways PJSC, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联邦存款保险公司称 "问题银行名单 "上季度增加了 8 家贷款机构
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.【原文：The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. said that the number of lenders with financial, operational or managerial weaknesses rose by eight to 52 during the last three months of 2023.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行可能在下周公布新政策框架
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲中央银行可能将于下周公布其实施货币政策的新框架。【原文：The European Central Bank will probably unveil a new framework for how it implements monetary policy next week, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 马克-罗文称阿波罗与反犹太主义斗争没有受到中东投资者的 "反击
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）表示，他反对大学校园反犹太主义的行动已被包括中东地区在内的投资者所接受。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan said his activism against antisemitism on college campuses has been accepted by his investors, including those in the Middle East.】

item.title: 拉加德预示欧洲央行 6 月降息，2% 通胀率指日可待
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，由于新的预测显示通胀率将在2025年达到2%的目标，决策者可能会在6月份降低利率。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde indicated policymakers may be in a position to lower interest rates in June as fresh projections showed inflation hitting the 2% target in 2025.】

item.title: 莫迪助手称 "低垂果实 "是保持 8%增长的关键
item.description: 印度一位高级经济官员表示，印度各邦政府应实施劳动力、土地和其他 "低垂的果实 "改革，以帮助维持国家经济增长，使其接近 8%。【原文：India’s state governments should implement labor, land and other reforms that are “low hanging fruits” to help sustain the nation’s economic growth nearer 8%, a top economic official said.】

item.title: 特鲁多春季预算令加拿大企业担心新税种
item.description: 财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）即将公布的预算案让加拿大商界的一些人担心，政府将通过增税来抵消新的开支。【原文：Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland’s upcoming budget has some in Canada’s business community concerned there will be tax increases to offset new government spending.】

item.title: 赫斯称圭亚那与埃克森公司的交易不适用于雪佛龙公司的销售
item.description: 赫斯公司（Hess Corp. ）对埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）关于在圭亚那生产石油的联合协议的解释提出异议，称该协议不适用于雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）提出的 530 亿美元收购要约。【原文：Hess Corp. is disputing Exxon Mobil Corp.’s interpretation of their joint agreement to produce oil in Guyana, saying the deal doesn’t apply to its pending $53 billion takeover offer from Chevron Corp.】

item.title: 经济前景黯淡，交易员加大欧洲央行降息押注
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的政策制定者们在最新预测中概述了欧元区较为暗淡的经济前景，交易商们因此押注欧洲央行今年将加大降息力度。【原文：Traders are betting on bigger interest-rate cuts from the European Central Bank this year after policymakers outlined a bleaker economic outlook for the euro area in their latest forecasts.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维持利率不变，通胀疲软引发降息预期
item.description: 欧洲中央银行在第四次会议上维持利率不变，原因是通胀和经济增长前景疲软，增强了从 6 月开始降息的预期。【原文：The European Central Bank left interest rates unchanged for a fourth meeting as a softer outlook for inflation and economic growth bolstered expectations for cuts starting in June.】

item.title: 科威特称石油需求健康且市场平衡
item.description: 科威特石油公司（Kuwait Petroleum Corp.【原文：Global oil consumption is strong and the market looks relatively balanced this year as OPEC+ tries to stabilize prices, according to the Chief Executive Officer of Kuwait Petroleum Corp.】

item.title: 印度禁止 JM Financial 管理公共债务问题
item.description: 根据印度证券交易委员会通过的初步命令，印度资本市场监管机构已禁止 JM 金融服务有限公司担任印度公司任何公开发行债务的管理人，原因是该公司涉嫌存在不公平交易行为和违反商业银行行为准则。【原文：India’s capital market regulator has barred JM Financial Services Ltd. from acting as a manager for any public issues of debt by Indian companies on account of alleged unfair trade practices and violation of code of conduct for merchant bankers, according to an initial order passed by the Securities and Exchange Board of India.】

item.title: 亨特的养老金威胁可能为英国股票增加 "数千亿英镑的收益
item.description: 据经纪商 Panmure Gordon 称，在英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）就该行业对国内公司的厌恶发出警告后，养老基金可能会向伦敦上市股票投入 "数百亿英镑（如果不是数千亿英镑的话）"。【原文：Pension funds could pour “tens if not hundreds of billions of pounds” into London-listed equities after Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt warned the industry about its aversion to domestic companies, according to broker Panmure Gordon.】

item.title: Signa 创始人本科在奥地利申请个人破产
item.description: 濒临破产的 Signa 企业集团创始人 Rene Benko 向奥地利一家法院申请个人破产，该法院正在审查他的个人财务状况。【原文：Rene Benko, the founder of the ailing Signa conglomerate, filed for personal insolvency at an Austrian court that was in the process of reviewing his personal finances.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯将价值 1640 亿美元的阿美石油公司股份转入财富基金
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯政府又向公共投资基金转让了价值 1,640 亿美元的阿美石油公司股份，此举旨在加强这家国家支持的投资者的现金流，该投资者正在加大对当地大型项目的支出。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s government transferred a further $164 billion stake in Aramco to the Public Investment Fund, a move aimed at bolstering cashflow at the state-backed investor that’s ramping up spending on huge local projects.】

item.title: 意大利时尚集团吸引粉丝，Prada、Miu Miu 销售额飙升
item.description: Prada SpA 的销售额跃升，原因是该意大利集团对一些最时髦的产品需求强劲，如磨砂皮休闲鞋和 Miu Miu 高跟鞋。【原文：Prada SpA sales jumped as the Italian group saw strong demand for some of its hippest products, like brushed leather loafers and Miu Miu pumps.】

item.title: 中东战争硝烟弥漫，数十亿美元的海湾权力游戏聚焦埃及
item.description: 在不到 10 天的时间里，埃及从经济灾难的边缘变成了从阿拉伯联合酋长国和国际货币基金组织获得 400 多亿美元的投资和贷款，沙特阿拉伯和其他国家可能还会提供更多的投资和贷款。【原文：In barely 10 days, Egypt has gone from the brink of economic disaster to unlocking more than $40 billion of investments and loans from the United Arab Emirates and International Monetary Fund, with the likelihood of more to come from Saudi Arabia and others.】

item.title: 银行因去年倒闭面临联邦存款保险公司 41 亿美元额外账单
item.description: 硅谷银行倒闭一年后，美国的贷款人仍在为收拾烂摊子付出代价，而且情况可能会更糟，损失约达 41 亿美元。【原文：A year after Silicon Valley Bank’s collapse, US lenders are still paying the price for cleaning up the mess — and it’s likely to get about $4.1 billion worse.】

item.title: 工会表示，致命的船只袭击意味着红海航行需要重新思考
item.description: 世界上最大的船员工会之一表示，在胡塞武装分子袭击造成三名船员死亡后，任何仍在红海航行的船只都应紧急重新考虑航程。【原文：One of the world’s biggest unions for ship-crew members said any vessels still sailing through the Red Sea should urgently reconsider the voyages following a Houthi militant attack that killed three sailors.】

item.title: 镍价可能很快从印尼引发的暴跌中复苏
item.description:
东南亚国家的大量供应压制了全球市场，但该金属可能会迎来反弹。【原文：

The Southeast Asian nation’s massive supply has suppressed the global market, but the metal might be in for a rally.

】

item.title: 墨西哥年度通胀放缓，为本月降息铺平道路
item.description: 墨西哥的总体通胀率自 10 月份以来首次放缓，这增加了人们对央行行长将在本月晚些时候启动降息周期的押注。【原文：Mexico’s headline inflation slowed for the first time since October, increasing bets that central bankers will start a cycle of interest rate cuts later this month.】

item.title: 加拿大首次公开募股(IPO)荒已持续一整年，但仍看不到结束的迹象
item.description: 加拿大最大的首次公开募股市场正迎来一个严峻的里程碑，即全年没有新股上市，而投资者关注的主题也很狭窄，资深银行家们预计在 2024 年下半年之前不会有任何缓解。【原文：Canada’s biggest market for initial public offerings is marking a grim milestone of a full year without a new listing, and with investors focused on a narrow set of themes, senior bankers don’t expect relief before the second half of 2024.】

item.title: 安联集团的 Subran 说：如果美联储按兵不动，欧洲央行将面临可怕的束缚
item.description: 2024年2月23日星期五，比利时根特，欧洲中央银行（ECB）行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）在欧盟（EU）经济和金融事务部长非正式会议的新闻发布会上。在乌克兰战争即将进入第三个年头之际，欧盟财政部长们正试图找出如何为增加的国防开支需求提供资金。摄影师：Simon Wohlfahrt/Bloomberg【原文：Christine Lagarde, president of the European Central Bank (ECB), during a news conference at an informal meeting of European Union (EU) economic and financial affairs ministers in Ghent, Belgium, on Friday, Feb. 23, 2024. European Union finance chiefs are trying to figure out how to fund increased spending needs for defense as the war in Ukraine is about to enter its third year. Photographer: Simon Wohlfahrt/Bloomberg】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔再次向立法者发表讲话，乔-拜登总统发表国情咨文，欧洲央行决定利率。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speaks to lawmakers again, President Joe Biden delivers his State of the Union address and the European Central Bank decides on interest rates. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 对人工智能的狂热推动芯片制造商期权交易翻番
item.description: 随着投资者将赌注押在时下股票市场最热门的人工智能上，半导体股票的期权交易正呈爆炸式增长。【原文：Options trading in semiconductor stocks is exploding as investors bet on the hottest thing in equity markets these days: artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 尼日利亚宣布加强石油和天然气投资的措施
item.description: 尼日利亚推出了旨在重振该国石油和天然气行业投资的新措施。【原文：Nigeria introduced new measures aimed at revamping investment in the country’s oil and natural gas sector.】

item.title: 塔巴科维奇考虑放松通胀，塞尔维亚维持利率不变
item.description: 塞尔维亚连续第八个月维持基准利率不变，因为央行行长约尔戈万卡-塔巴科维奇（Jorgovanka Tabakovic）预计通胀率将在今年年底前重返货币当局的目标。【原文：Serbia held the benchmark interest rate unchanged for an eighth month as central bank Governor Jorgovanka Tabakovic expects inflation to return toward the monetary authority’s target by the end of this year.】
